ygData.subject: Re: Searching for wreckage
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been helping friends with Seafuries, and I ve been all over the area near Sister Isle/Gornit s island, but haven t seen any wreckage.  Maybe there are
ygData.messageBody:
I've been helping friends with Seafuries, and I've
been all over the area near Sister Isle/Gornit's
island, but haven't seen any wreckage. Maybe there
are "ghosts" of the crew there that might show up on
ranger tracking. Kinda like those zombies in the ship
in the ocean near Erudin. I'll have to get a friend
to come with me for some exploring

Gazamel

--- ALEX SHIMANOVSKY <10815@...> wrote:
> We should start a search web site, and post where we
> have searched, the
> locs and so on so more of us wont re do the same
> thing that way people from
> different servers can do it too.
>
